Actions.Name: Send SMS
Actions.Description: Send SMS to a single or multiple recipients

Actions.Name: Contact Create
Actions.Description: Create a contact record in TrueDialog

Actions.Name: Contact Search
Actions.Description: Searches for a contact via a phone number or email address.

Actions.Name: Delivery Notice Received
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow for each delivery notice receipt

Actions.Name: Incoming Message Received
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow whenever end user texts in

Actions.Name: Invalid Targets
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow if targets have been filtered out during sending SMS

Actions.Name: Keyword Received
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow whenever end user texts in a keyword

Actions.Name: Stop Message Received
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow whenever end user texts in STOP or synonym

Actions.Name: Get Current User Info
Actions.Description: Get information about User, whose credentials were used in Connection
